channel.title: Wow what happened to all the rep?
channel.description: i had 4 rep and now its gone.. i see other people have 0 rep too and some have 50

item.title: Wow what happened to all the rep?
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:5, topic:41140”][quote author=rob1601 link=topic=57637.msg709636#msg709636 date=1167499902]
Personally i think it is silly because i think like senior members should be able to rep because we have made 100+ posts
[/quote]

Yeah but Senior Members could have posted nothing but off topic or useless posts. Your post count means nothing. Anyone can post. Its the useful posts that count.[/quote]

Techically what he means to say is that a senior can be a total noob by posting spam or offtopic posts. Not all seniors are good. And Community Members are chosen by there good deeds. So thats what makes them rep.

Read full topic
item.source: Wow what happened to all the rep?

item.title: Wow what happened to all the rep?
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

Rep has been reset for all Member’s you now need 15 rep to rep others. And only Community Members Atm can rep. So this determines REAL rep. Not fake rep.
